author: Entertainment desk
title: Pawan Kalyan's fans perform puja and shower milk to celebrate Hari Hara Veera Mallu release: Watch
text: Actor and politician Pawan Kalyan's starrer historical period drama Hari Hara Veera Mallu has recently hit the theatres, and fans canâ€™t keep calm. Several fans have celebrated the release of the highly anticipated film with grand events. Several videos and pictures of the celebration are going viral on social media. A few clips show fans gathering outside the theatres and dancing. Meanwhile, one video shows fans performing puja and applying tilak to Pawan Kalyanâ€™s poster outside Vimal Theatre, Hyderabad. ðŸš¨ðŸš¨Team Alert: Our Team Celebration plans and Theatre details will be revealed soon once after the confirmation of Hari Hara Veera Mallu Release dateâœ…@HHVMFilm@PawanKalyanâ¤ï¸@AgerwalNidhhiâ¤ï¸ Our next planning will be double than Gabbarsingh4k re-release Stay tuned to ourâ€¦ pic.twitter.com/V3tIUpcIIC â€” HYDERABAD PSPK FANS - RTC X ROADS ðŸ¦… (@HydPSPKFansRTCX) May 9, 2025 Another video shows fans pouring milk at the huge cutout of Pawan Kalyan. However, several fans also distributed free food to the moviegoers. Food donated on behalf of #Hariharaveeramallu celebrations at Sandhya Bangalore by Fan's ðŸ‘Œâ¤ï¸#BlockBusterHHVM pic.twitter.com/sXZiE1ZhKq â€” KARNATAKA PawanKalyan FCâ„¢ (@KarnatakaPSPKFC) July 23, 2025 Pawan portrays the titular outlaw, Veera Mallu, the first Indian to defy the Mughal empire in Hari Hara Veera Mallu. The film is released in the theatres on Friday, July 24 and is expected to enjoy a decent run at the box office. Also Read: Hari Hara Veera Mallu Twitter Review: Pawan Kalyan's period drama fails to impress, netizens call it a 'disaster' Directed by Krish and Jyothi Krisna and produced by AM Rathnam, the action adventure features a star-studded cast including Nidhhi Agerwal and Bobby Deol in lead roles. Nargis Fakhri, Nora Fatehi, Sathyaraj, among others, also star in the film. The film is produced by A. M. Rathnam, A. Dayakar Rao and Vipin Agnihotri. Hari Hara Veera Mallu is set in the 17th-century Mughal Empire, and follows the celebrated warrior Veera Mallu, played by Pawan, who is given the mission to recover the Koh-i-Noor diamond to rescue a city from Mughal soldiers. He spearheads a revolution against the tyrannical actions of the army generals.",
